explains: adj. （谈话的风格、用语等）会话式的，口语的；谈话的，会话的
wordGroup: conversational implicature 会话含义，言外之意；会话含意
conversational system 对话系统；会话系统

sentences.en: I learnt conversational Spanish at evening classes.
sentences.cn: 我在夜校班学过西班牙语会话。

sentences.en: It's possible that we all have compromised conversational intelligence.
sentences.cn: 我们都有可能会向会话智能妥协。

sentences.en: Mary is ambitious enough to aspire to conversational fluency in Chinese in four months.
sentences.cn: 玛丽雄心很大， 竟立志在四个月里学会用汉语流利地会话。
